message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $110. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $95 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I see you recognize the value in this product.  How about we meet in the middle at $105?
I appreciate your offer, Alice. I think $100 would be a fair price for the product considering its value to me.
